name: Manifest Gale
description:
When the character to which this is attached uses Charged Attack: Spend 1 less Unaligned Element, Physical DMG dealt converted to Anemo DMG, and attaches Pressurized Collapse to the target character.
Usage(s): 1
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached uses $[K51]:</color> Spend 1 less <color=#80FFD7FF>$[K309]</color>, $[K100] dealt converted to $[K105], and attaches <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1024]</color> to the target character.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color>
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color>:</color> Spend 1 less <color=#80FFD7FF><color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1109}Unaligned Element</color></color>, {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color> dealt converted to {SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>, and attaches <color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Pressurized Collapse</color></color> to the target character.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 1</color>
